Name: SBK 2011: Superbike World Championship
Overview: The latest entry in the official FIM World Superbike Championship series delivers graphical and handling improvements while retaining the same core experience of last year's SBK X: Superbike World Championship. All of the bikes, riders, and circuits from the 2011 World Superbike season are included, alongside 17 classic riders in the new Legends class. With the brand-new SBK Tour in addition to a good Career mode, SBK 2011 has plenty of content to satisfy motorcycle racing fans, as well as fans of racing games in general.
